attributes.review: I really do hate this app it’s incredibly slow and ever since I downloaded it my phone keeps crashing. To anyone reading this do yourself a favor and DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. And while your at it give it that 1 star rating
attributes.title: What even is this??

attributes.review: This app kept asking for my private information, and was overall really bad. We shouldn’t have to be afraid that our information gets sent to the government, do what’s needed and remove the app
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: It took DAYS to download and when it finally did, oranges took over my house and sacrificed my food to trump! In my opinion he already eats too much! DO NOT download this 😡❌. ALSO Trump looks to orange to be president. He’s fat and stinky. I can’t believe I’m even related to trump supporters❌. TRUMP 2020 💕✨🧚🏻‍♀️ IN A GRAVE.❤️🧚🏻‍♀️💕✨
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER 😡🇺🇸❌

attributes.review: this app is the worst I don’t know why anyone would download it, my dog got so mad when I downloaded this app she attacked me. I can’t believe it why this this app even exists. I would rather have a bird for president. anyways, i don’t like this app.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: this app gave me a virus so now whenever I open my phone I am greeted with a barrage of inappropriate notifications. have to go out and get my phone software fixed. would not recommend.
attributes.title: dangerous do not download

attributes.review: This app makes me want to say the n word I got so mad at it I’m so mad I say almost n word it’s so slow and slow and not fast at all i throw my phone at the wall because it was so slow I hate app so much I will say the n word
attributes.title: I was about to say the N-word

attributes.review: This app took so long to download! It doesn't work for me either. My aunt LOVES, she ADORES Trump. So when she figured out that this app didn't work for me, she was devastated. I'm not one to write reviews, but this app was AWFUL ABSOLUTELY AWFUL. Some times I couldn't even get into it. Please fix it.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: Really bad. Took weeks to download and there was terrible music playing. Glitchy, hard to work, and oranges kept showing up on my screen. I don’t know how to get rid of them. They are smelly and repulsive.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: This app is suppose to be decent and work good enough for me to follow up on what’s going on with the us president but it crashes every time I open it just like trump because he has dementia
attributes.title: Terrible app and even worse president

attributes.review: Not only did the app spread awful misconceptions about the president, but it also tried to kill me. In the middle of a long drive my phone started going off. It wouldn’t stop texting me. It was very distracting.
attributes.title: This app is very dangerous
